price: као да на њој никад нису ни постојали. Далеко био Меден, као и Семуд!
arabic: كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَآۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّمَدۡيَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتۡ ثَمُودُ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ka-an lam yaghnaw fīhā alā buʿ'dan limadyana kamā baʿidat thamūdu
